name: RoboRumble (Duck Sized Games, sk_ape, FedyaBoss, DSG_Asarial)
name_original: RoboRumble (Duck Sized Games, sk_ape, FedyaBoss, DSG_Asarial)
description:
Welcome to ROBORUMBLE - a game where you fend off robot hordes using a robot of your own! Success at striking your foes down and get powerfull upgrades, but never relax: you're not the only one evolving...

WASD (arrow keys) to move

1-3 to cycle weapons

LMB to shoot
P to pause

Used assets (copyright-free sounds and music):

1) https://freesound.org/people/josefpres/sounds/671028/

2) https://freesound.org/people/JomelleJager/sounds/248212/

3) https://freesound.org/people/deleted_user_1941307/sounds/155790/

4) https://freesound.org/people/RedheadedTeddy+/sounds/458971/

5) https://freesound.org/people/Aegersum/sounds/387924/

6) https://freesound.org/people/Breviceps/sounds/557595/

7) https://freesound.org/people/mickfire/sounds/326414/
